name: vscode-coverage-gutters
description: Display test coverage generated by lcov or xml - works with many languages

coverage-gutters.highlightlight.description: light themed highlight for code coverage

coverage-gutters.highlightdark.description: dark themed highlight for code coverage

coverage-gutters.partialHighlightLight.description: light theme partial highlight for code coverage

coverage-gutters.partialHighlightDark.description: dark theme partial highlight for code coverage

coverage-gutters.noHighlightLight.description: light theme partial highlight for code coverage

coverage-gutters.noHighlightDark.description: dark theme partial highlight for code coverage

coverage-gutters.gutterIconPathLight.description: path to an icon (svg, png, etc) for displaying in the gutter for full coverage

coverage-gutters.gutterIconPathDark.description: path to an icon (svg, png, etc) for displaying in the gutter for full coverage

coverage-gutters.partialGutterIconPathLi.description: path to an icon (svg, png, etc) for displaying in the gutter for partial coverage

coverage-gutters.partialGutterIconPathDa.description: path to an icon (svg, png, etc) for displaying in the gutter for partial coverage

coverage-gutters.noGutterIconPathLight.description: path to an icon (svg, png, etc) for displaying in the gutter for no coverage

coverage-gutters.noGutterIconPathDark.description: path to an icon (svg, png, etc) for displaying in the gutter for no coverage

coverage-gutters.showLineCoverage.description: show or hide the line coverage

coverage-gutters.showRulerCoverage.description: show or hide the ruler coverage

coverage-gutters.showGutterCoverage.description: show or hide the gutter coverage

coverage-gutters.ignoredPathGlobs.description: paths that will be ignored by the extension

coverage-gutters.remotePathResolve.description: helps with coverage generated outside the local file system by swapping fragments of remote paths with local ones (EG ['/var/www/', '/home/project/']). See https://github.com/ryanluker/vscode-coverage-gutters/issues/201 for more info.

coverage-gutters.manualCoverageFilePaths.description: take manual control over the absolute path to your coverage file(s)

coverage-gutters.coverageBaseDir.description: workspaceFolder relative path or glob that will be used for coverage file lookup `${coverageBaseDir}/{${coverageFileNames}}`

coverage-gutters.coverageFileNames.description: coverage file names for the extension to automatically look for

coverage-gutters.coverageReportFileName.description: default coverage report file names(can be glob style) to look for when using the preview command

coverage-gutters.customizable.status-bar.description: enable or disable the status bar item

coverage-gutters.customizable.context-me.description: enable or disable quick commands in the context menu

scripts.build: npm install && npm run lint && npm run compile
